html:
1.24.20  6:34 pm   Hi bill! you have been on my mind today. where's the timer at? are you learning the hell out of those new tools? please feel free to beat the new tools into submission.

     i am trying, but bpy context issues are killing me

1.24.20  5:56 pm   do chicken wings actually have wings im confused 

     no, that would be a chicken wing wing

1.24.20  5:35 pm   Are you afraid of abstract communication leading to misunderstanding?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

1.24.20  5:26 pm   I am trying to compose music but I am feeling so overwhelmed by all the possibilities. Its like everytime I try to write a note down, I am crushed by the weight of millions of potential chord progressions, keys, rhythms and song meanings.

     that's true

     Your compositions are so free and sophisticated., what was it like when you first started writing music?

     i had been feeling the same way as you for a long time, and finally out of desperation i decided to write terribly on purpose, in various ways. it produced a lot of non-terrible things which i became quite attached to. then the secret was keeping all of them in a list and being organized with it

     And can you offer any advice to people new to writing music?  

     first you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

1.24.20  5:10 pm   What is Steve's real name? Not knowing has bothered me for a very long time.

     could be you

1.24.20  5:04 pm   I have eat bread/feel sure playing nonstop inmy head now, it makes me thinking about death, but in a good way... you know? 

     not quite

1.24.20  5:04 pm   oh god i'm so lonely what should i do

     book tour!

1.24.20  4:42 pm   do real people answer these questions?

     just 1

1.24.20  4:40 pm   Just did a bad thing,I regret the thing I did. Do you have any advice?

     book tour!

1.24.20  4:22 pm   When are you going to talk about velcro in a video?

     when it improves more

1.24.20  4:00 pm   How does one buy a car?

     you could get one of the self buying ones

1.24.20  3:20 pm   what is the favorite video that you have made? 

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.24.20  2:52 pm   do i have to ask this question?

     no

1.24.20  2:34 pm   When are you gonna uplod next

     i'm having a countdown timer

1.24.20  2:29 pm   shoes are good?

     slightly

1.24.20  2:25 pm   have you ever experienced a hallucination?

     not really

1.24.20  1:57 pm   would you say that you are well-integrated in society

     i have received some various honorary certificates of integration. some of them may need to be renewed at some point

1.24.20  1:28 pm   How much content are you going to release when the countdown timer reaches 0?

     oh about several handfuls

1.24.20  1:11 pm   I don't like it when people feel the need to have favorites of things. I don't have a favorite of like, anything. How do you deal with this when people ask for your favorite [insert arbitrary thing here]?

     i always welcome the opportunity to be challenged to make the best use of the time, regardless

1.24.20  1:02 pm   What do you want me to draw?(i'm realy going to draw it) 

     a dot

1.24.20  12:33 pm   Since teachers are so uptight about whether I say Can I? or May I?, I think I should ask Will I?, and then if they get the answer wrong I'll just deduct points from Their grade.

     that makes sense

1.24.20  12:31 pm   What is your opinion on microbiology?

     just the right size

1.24.20  12:11 pm   i thought i told you to stop stealing my eggs bill, you know what the conseuqences are my friend

     i have yet to even steal them for the first time

1.24.20  12:05 pm   what happens to steve after the hi im steve video ends

     gets dry, goes to next gig

1.24.20  11:10 am   I need to write a persuasive essay for school. I gotta come up with my own topic but I dont know what it should be. I don't really feel like persuading. 

     persuade them to give you a medium grade. trust me, i've gone through the possibilities and i think you'll win with this one

1.24.20  10:56 am   what can hedgehogs do?

     they do a lot of press conferences

1.24.20  10:16 am   any life advices?

     step 1 get born

1.24.20  9:51 am   When will you make a new song? If so could i have one or a few of the lyrics?

     i only provide lyrics with the music together. except for on the 'lyrics page', which i have conveniently made a terrible color to gently encourage you to not be there

1.24.20  8:57 am   also i really love ur content and stuff and things, i feel you capture the emotion of wonder very well and i hope you have a good day

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

1.24.20  8:10 am   heyo bill, do you know how to stop waiting for a certain milestone to do things? i feel that its a big problem because when i want to do things like write a story and create things i always seem to convince myself to wait until im old enough or when my skills get better. it's not fun because i have many things i want to do but i feel very stuck

     yes, you are waiting until you feel like you have no choice

1.24.20  7:55 am   I'm going through a hard time right now and don't know what to do with my life right now. How do I find meaning?

     you may not believe this, but it works every time. walk somewhere

1.24.20  7:14 am   WILL YOU EVER USE A CAPITAL LETTER IN ONE OF YOUR VIDEOS?

     have you ever watched one, there's literally capital letters all over them

1.24.20  7:00 am   Did u ever answer a question incorrectly on purpose?

     sometimes i answer them twice as correct as they should be

1.24.20  6:16 am   which musicians and musical groups influence your music, if any

     all of them

1.24.20  5:58 am   you said your favorite letter is r and yet in another answer you ranked T as number one, well WHICH ONE IS IT?!!?!

     don't care. whichever one i saw most recently

1.24.20  4:52 am   how many people today have told you your music is a blessing?

     same amount as the people who said it's cursed

1.24.20  4:41 am   Do you memorize the lyrics to your songs by heart?

     no

1.24.20  4:02 am   Are you as random in real life as you are on the internet?

     random is only just for some of the smaller decorations, or occasional plot twists here and there. the core of it has to make deep sense. that is a standard practice i hold for everything, on or off the internet

1.24.20  3:57 am   Do you willingly listen to modern hip hop sometimes?

     yes, although not enough

1.24.20  3:24 am   When listening to something new in my head. I can either keep listening and risk forgetting it or stop this download and try to record voicenotrs that nay resemble it. How do you deal when faced eith that decision? Keep listening? Start taking notes and risk losing the listening state?

     start taking notes, and/or also record a brief jam on it. then date it and put it in the list. any half way decent archaeologist (you) should be able to make music out of it next time, if you did your job the first time but most importantly if you had fun

1.24.20  2:55 am   when's the best time to go to sleep

     2:40 pm

1.24.20  2:54 am   do you record straight to your laptop or through like a box thing that does eq and all that

     my laptop is in my underwear drawer

1.24.20  2:39 am   do you use keyboards with weighted keys ever

     i can but i would rather not

1.24.20  1:57 am   what would your podcast be about?

     general goings on, round and about the planet

1.24.20  1:54 am   I'm writing a new résumé. What can i put on it to put it a cut above the the rest?

     just put as many of those accents as you can

1.24.20  1:50 am   Is there any economical/social progress without financial debt?

     surely

1.24.20  1:48 am   I don't really have a question I just want to say I really enjoy your content. Every time I play one of your songs on iTunes it livens up every situation no matter how tedious or boring. Thank you for creating amazing music.

     thank you for your sudden outburst of friendliness

1.24.20  1:40 am   I want to put things into words but it seems that I am incapable of pulling this off. How do you arrange different words in a certain order in a way that is reflective of what you wish to convey?

     it's like walking, you have to crawl all over the entire floor first. open up a text file and just start crawling on the floor. surely you have seen me do something similar

1.24.20  1:16 am   Our of all videos on the internet, which is your favourite?

     roundhay garden scene

1.24.20  1:04 am   Hi Bill, do you often think about the inescapable heat death of the universe, and the fact that even if we outrun death, we cannot escape the end?

     the heat death has been bought by disney, so i'm excited, it's probably gonna be pretty good
